article_title: My Wife's Losing Her Obamacare Coverage Because The Insurer Lost $400 Million

article_metadata.author: Merrill Matthews

og.description: First, my wife's premiums increased significantly last year; now her health insurer is canceling the policy because that plan still lost $400 million.
